item.title: Languages
item.description: Programming language thoughts I feel like I am always looking for a different low level programming language alternative to C++, but always end up back at C++. I have been looking at Zig lang, but I didn’t really want to learn about their allocators, no good excuse really. Then I have been looking at Odin lang, but last time I was trying it their linux support wasn’t really there. The Arch package was outdated and didn’t come with their vendor directory.

item.title: Init
item.description: Hello there This is my initial commit for a blog post on my site. Awesome I know. I switched to using Hugo for generating my site because I am a programmer at heart and I cannot make a site that looks good by only using HTML and CSS Anyways the initial post is going to be short as it is basically just here to be here :D Cya

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, World! I’m JJoe or even JJoeDev at times. I am a student based in Denmark with a love for code. Currently I am slowly trying to force my self to use NeoVim because it looks really cool, and then I rely less on electron apps. My heart has a special place for C++ because it is just a joy to write and make stuff in. I also have space recerved for FOSS in general and Linux.
